headline: Exxon Will Benefit Most from South America’s Newest Petrostate
summary: ExxonMobil is poised to benefit significantly from Guyana's emergence as a major oil-producing nation due to favorable terms in the prolific Stabroek Block and ongoing development projects.

raw.headline: Exxon Will Benefit Most from South America’s Newest Petrostate
raw.summary: ExxonMobil is poised to benefit significantly from Guyana's emergence as a major oil-producing nation due to favorable terms in the prolific Stabroek Block and ongoing development projects.

headline: Big Oil's "Managed Decline" Strategy Masks An Expansion Push
summary: While companies maintain stakes in renewables like offshore wind, solar, and hydrogen, these are treated as peripheral diversification plays rather than core businesses.

raw.headline: Big Oil's "Managed Decline" Strategy Masks An Expansion Push

headline: ExxonMobil Brings Fourth FPSO Online, Boosts Stabroek Block Output
summary: XOM starts production at Yellowtail with its largest FPSO, One Guyana, boosting Stabroek Block capacity to over 900,000 barrels a day.

raw.headline: ExxonMobil Brings Fourth FPSO Online, Boosts Stabroek Block Output
raw.summary: XOM starts production at Yellowtail with its largest FPSO, One Guyana, boosting Stabroek Block capacity to over 900,000 barrels a day.

headline: If You Invested $10K In Exxon Mobil Stock 10 Years Ago, How Much Would You Have Now?
summary: Exxon Mobil Corp. (NYSE:XOM) explores and produces crude oil and natural gas globally. It is set to report its Q3 2025 earnings on Oct. 31. Wall Street analysts expect the company to post EPS of $1.61, down from $1.92 in the prior-year period. ...

headline: ExxonMobil Boosts Guyana Oil Production to New Heights
summary: ExxonMobil has significantly increased Guyana's oil production capacity with the launch of the Yellowtail project, bringing the total output from the Stabroek block to 900,000 barrels per day.

raw.headline: ExxonMobil Boosts Guyana Oil Production to New Heights
raw.summary: ExxonMobil has significantly increased Guyana's oil production capacity with the launch of the Yellowtail project, bringing the total output from the Stabroek block to 900,000 barrels per day.

headline: Why Exxon Mobil Crushes Chevron In 2025
summary: Exxon Mobil trades cheaper than Chevron across most valuation metrics. Click here to find out why I rate XOM stock a buy and CVX stock a hold, respectively.

headline: Top Mining Lubricants Companies to Watch in 2025 and Beyond | Mining Lubricants Company Evaluation Report 2025
summary: The Mining Lubricants Companies Quadrant offers a thorough industry analysis, highlighting the dynamics of the global Mining Lubricants market. It evaluates over 40 companies, recognizing the Top 13 as quadrant leaders, including Exxon Mobil, TotalEnergies, and Shell. These specially formulated lubricants are essential for enhancing machinery performance in mining operations across sectors like coal and iron ore. summary: This new venture is expected to significantly boost the country's oil output and joins three other projects already in operation.

headline: FDL: The Portfolio Rebalance Is Hurting Performance; Consider Alternatives
summary: The recent portfolio rebalance increased FDL's risk and volatility, with 55% concentration in its top 10 holdings. Read why I downgrade FDL ETF to a Hold.
